name: Satan Skates
description:
Satan Skates is a parody of the game Stan Skates. Where you go through Hell, Skeleton Los Vegas and Vinceworld, to slay the skeletons that have been summoned by the mastermind of Vinceworld, who has legally changed his name to Radskull

Defeat enemies, Pick up stuff, Fire your weapon, and jump a lot!

This is a game made by LeatherIceCream, MGZone and Harvey Rothman

It was made in 2 weeks.

Note: If you want to keep your scores, it is recommended you do so on the downloadable version of the game, because the highscores will be wiped on the browser version every time we update.
